snippet: Steve Stricker, the 45-year-old veteran who played in 19 tournaments last year, plans to just about halve that to spend more time with his family and his foundation.
abstract: Veteran golfer Steve Stricker, who has been battling pinched nerve pain for months, finishes second round of Tournament of Champions in Hawaii three strokes behind Dustin Johnson; plans to cut back his tournament play in order to spend more time with his family and foundation.
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker, the 45-year-old veteran who played in 19 tournaments last year, plans to just about halve that to spend more time with his family and his foundation.

headline.seo: Stricker Cuts Back P.G.A. Tour Schedule
headline.main: Stricker Hangs In While Cutting Back
headline.print_headline: Stricker Hangs In While Cutting Back
